document_data.name: Herald's Call
document_data.mainbody: '''''Herald's call''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[bard]]s and [[harper scout]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell allowed the caster to daze a crowd of creatures. During casting, the spell created a very loud authoritative shout. Any creature with {{SI|30|ft}} became dazed. Any creature beyond this radius heard the shout but were not affected by the spell.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
